poke_power.name: Psychic Trace
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Claydol is your Active Pokémon, you may shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards in your opponent’s hand. This power can’t be used if Claydol is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Ancient Mantra
attacks.effect: If Claydol has any {P} Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If Claydol has any {F} Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.
